content: As an AI language model, I cannot predict the future actions of corporations. However, many companies have recognized the importance of sustainable and responsible operations and have taken steps to improve their practices. The expectation of society and consumers for companies to engage in ethical and socially responsible practices is growing. Additionally, new regulations and standards are emerging that mandate corporate social responsibility and sustainable practices, which can influence a company's actions. Therefore, it is possible that more companies will begin to adopt these practices in the future.
